description: Gets a list of the Amazon Web Services from which Audit Manager can collect evidence. Audit Manager defines which Amazon Web Services are in scope for an assessment. Audit Manager infers this scope by examining the assessment's controls and their data sources, and then mapping this information to one or more of the corresponding Amazon Web Services that are in this list.

nested_items.name: serviceMetadata
nested_items.description: The metadata that's associated with the Amazon Web Service.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon Web Service.

nested_items.name: displayName
nested_items.description: The display name of the Amazon Web Service.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the Amazon Web Service.

nested_items.name: category
nested_items.description: The category that the Amazon Web Service belongs to, such as compute, storage, or database.
